title: God Hardens Pharaoh's Heart
description:
Readings from:
Exodus 7:1-5, 8-13
Today's passages were read by Amanda McClendon, a librarian and a member of Sojourn Heights Church in Houston, Texas.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
